attributes.comment:
I oppose the raising of fees for adoption related documents. If this is not financially
acceptable, then I suggest the timelines extend to the completion of the applied
for adoption.

Currently the biometric results are good for 12 months and the I-600/600A is good
for 18 months. International timelines are such that parents are having to submit
these fees twice for a single adoption.

Our family submitted fees twice for our first adoption and will do so again for our
third adoption. Duplication of services at such high costs serves no purpose and
puts an undue financial burden on the families. It puts an additional burden on
USCIS to replicate the services they have already provided.

Thank you for considering this point of view.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Susana Rivera
